snippet.title: 10 new photos from the next 'Game of Thrones' episode tease trouble in Westeros
snippet.content:
Warning: Spoilers ahead for "Game of Thrones," including speculation of future events.
HBO just dropped new photos for the upcoming "Game of Thrones" episode, "Spoils of War," and they tease brewing conflicts on multiple fronts. We know from the trailer that we can expect to see the , and But what else is in store?
Let's take a closer look at the new photos to see if we discern some hints about what's to come.
